title: TrainTrip
description: A trip on a commercial train line.

allOf.description: A trip or journey. An itinerary of visits to one or more places.

arrivalPlatform.description: The platform where the train arrives.

arrivalStation.description: The station where the train trip ends.

departurePlatform.description: The platform from which the train departs.

departureStation.description: The station from which the train departs.

trainName.description: The name of the train (e.g. The Orient Express).

trainNumber.description: The unique identifier for the train.
